Class SwingFactory

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

      • getFileName

        public static java.lang.String getFileName(java.awt.Component parent)
        Opens a JFileChooser and returns the result.
        author Rana Bhattacharyya
        Parameters:
        parent - Component to center on.
        Returns:
        String of the file's path or null if no file was selected.

      • getFileName

        public static java.io.File getFileName(java.awt.Component parent,
                                       javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter filter)
        Parameters:
        parent - Component to center on.
        filter - Filter to use for filtering displayed files.
        Returns:
        Resulting file or null if none were selected or box was closed by means other than the Open button.

      • makeDefaultJFrame

        public static javax.swing.JFrame makeDefaultJFrame()
        Calls makeDefaultJFrame(String, int, int) with an empty title and a width and height of 300.
        Returns:
        An empty JFrame of size 300x300 that exits when closed.

      • makeDefaultJFrame

        public static javax.swing.JFrame makeDefaultJFrame(java.lang.String title)
        Calls makeDefaultJFrame(String, int, int) with the specified title and a width and height of 300.
        Parameters:
        title - Title for the frame.
        Returns:
        An empty JFrame with a set title that exits when closed.

      • makeDefaultJFrame

        public static javax.swing.JFrame makeDefaultJFrame(java.lang.String title,
                                                   int width,
                                                   int height)
        Creates a JFrame that exits when closed with the specified title, width, and height.
        Parameters:
        title - Title for the frame.
        width - Width of the frame.
        height - Height of the frame.
        Returns:
        An empty JFrame with a set title that exits when closed.

      • showFrame

        public static void showFrame(javax.swing.JFrame frame)
        Sets up a frame and displays it. Calls the following methods on frame:
        frame.pack();
        frame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
        frame.setVisible(true);
        Parameters:
        frame - JFrame to be setup and shown.

                                              java.awt.event.ActionListener al)

        Returns a JLabel for each element in vals.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getActionCommand

        public static java.lang.String getActionCommand(java.util.EventObject e)
        Retrieves the set action command from an EventObject if it is an AbstractButton or subclass.
        Parameters:
        e - EventObject trigger.
        Returns:
        if e.getSource() instanceof AbstractButton then AbstractButton.getActionCommand()
        null otherwise.
        See Also:
        AbstractButton

      • addTitledBorder

        public static javax.swing.JComponent addTitledBorder(javax.swing.JComponent c,
                                                     java.lang.String title)
        Calls JComponent.setBorder(new TitledBorder(new EmptyBorder(0,0,0,0),title)).
        Parameters:
        c - JComponent to add the TitledBorder to.
        title - The title to be set.
        Returns:
        The JComponent after setting a TitledBorder using an EmptyBorder and giving it title title.
        See Also:
        JComponent, BorderFactory
